name: ShitekinaChiruno - Touhou Project
description:
What is ShitekinaChiruno:

- ShitekinaChiruno is a shitty meme fangame from cirno of touhou project that has a really short duration of 1 or 2 minutes.

Why do i create ShitekinaChiruno:

- ShitekinaChiruno is a very basic game that i created for fun to rest from my main project.
